articles.title: Mahakumbh: Ash-smeared holy men lead India bathing spectacle - BBC.com
articles.description: Millions are taking a dip in the sacred Ganges river on the first major bathing day of Kumbh Mela festival.
articles.content:
Watch: Millions take a holy dip on day two of India's Mahakumbh Mela
Ash-smeared naked Hindu holy men charged into India's most sacred river Ganges at dawn on the first most significant bathing day … [+6320 chars]
